reviews.text: Two happy kids through this place over 4 years. The carers love the kids, like, really really love the kids.  It's a wonderful place and we'll miss it.

Alpha is the warm and loving second home for your kids. Alpha have been absolutely fantastic in welcoming my three girls into the centre. Everyone that works there goes above and beyond to make my kids feel special and nurtured. I absolutely recommend Alpha. They have been so important to our family.

Our daughter has been at the centre since she was 9 months and we absolutely love Alpha (our daughter included!). The staff are warm, loving and caring. Most of them have been have been working there anywhere from 10-30+ Years. This in itself says a lot about the values of the centre and the fact that the educators love what they do. We love the sense of community and the fact that children are taught and encouraged to celebrate the multicultural society we live in. Most importantly we know that are daughter is loved and cared for. We would highly recommend Alpha!

We found that Alpha was the best choice for ensuring a multicultural experience in a warm, friendly environment with professional and consistent support. Our child was supported in adapting and feeling confident and secure following our arrival to Australia, while the staff listened to our needs during that transitional time. Our child enjoys all the real animal experiences, celebrating multicultural holidays and learning through play. Our child has made strong bonds with the staff and children, enjoys an equal amount of physical and intellectual activity, is confident and happy. We will miss Alpha when our little one goes to school next year; it has been lovely to have that sense of community and warmth but also the confidence that our child is fully prepared for primary school. We would definitely recommend Alpha to anyone.

We couldn’t be happier. Most of the staff have been there over 10 years, some even over 30 years, which I think is important for consistency. The staff are loving and friendly. We love the Greek program where the kids learn Greek as well as English.
